official_title: A bill to prohibit the printing of Federal Reserve notes in the denomination of $100, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the printing of any Federal Reserve notes in the denomination of $100 after the date of the enactment of this Act. States that Federal Reserve notes in the denomination of $100 shall not be legal tender after December 31, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the printing of Federal Reserve notes in the denomination of $100, and for other purposes.
